title: Why has it been so long since Alistar and Tristana have been in the Free Rotation?
body: Why has it been so long since Alistar and Tristana have been in the Free Rotation? Aren't all champions meant to be in it?

replies.body: only certain champs are in free rotation every week usually they ones with new skins foe dat money

[Because you are able to get them, and one of their skins for free. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-)

For the Alistair one I am unsure why it is not available in OCE, you can always send a support ticket in with proof that you have subbed to their youtube channel and perhaps they will be nice enough to credit it to your account (although they might not).

But Garen is in the free rotation? And new players all get him when they get level 3 ;/ 
Good thought though, unless you're right but they just forgot to take Garen out

Garen is most likely left in because he is very simple to use, and is perfect for new players. He's also comparatively cheaper to the other two champs and its not really that much of a loss if you find out you can get him for free if you have already purchased him for 450. 

You actually also get him when you hit level 3 with a new account as part of the "leveling rewards". 

I definitely think they need to promote their free swag a bit better so more people are aware of what they can get for free.
